53  html = _factory.Factory( 
54      parser=_soup.parser.DEFAULT_PARSER.html, 
55      builder=_soup.builder.SoupBuilder, 
56      encoder=_soup.encoder.SoupEncoder, 
57      decoder=_soup.decoder.HTMLDecoder, 
58      default_eventfilter_list=(_soup.filters.EncodingDetectFilter,), 
59  ) 
60   
61  xml = _factory.Factory( 
62      parser=_soup.parser.DEFAULT_PARSER.xml, 
63      builder=_soup.builder.SoupBuilder, 
64      encoder=_soup.encoder.SoupEncoder, 
65      decoder=_soup.decoder.XMLDecoder, 
66      default_encoding='utf-8', 
67      default_eventfilter_list=(_soup.filters.EncodingDetectFilter,), 
68  ) 
69   
70   
71  text = _factory.Factory( 
72      parser=_text.parser.TextParser, 
73      builder=_text.builder.TextBuilder, 
74      encoder=_text.encoder.TextEncoder, 
75      decoder=_text.decoder.TextDecoder, 
76      default_encoding='utf-8', 
77      default_eventfilter_list=(_text.filters.EncodingDetectFilter,), 
78  )
